Headline: #87 87th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 87th/Tripp
ShortDescription: WB 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Pulaski, 79th, Cicero and 87th due to, street blockage near 87th/Tripp.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Pulaski, 79th, Cicero and 87th due to, street blockage near 87th/Tripp.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
